projects.name: auth0_package
projects.description: auth0_package is a cutting-edge npm package that automates your entire authentication process. It is your ultimate tool for effortlessly setting up authentication routes (login, signup, and logout) powered by JWT and bcrypt.js for top-notch security. With just a few commands, it automatically configures everything, integrating seamlessly into your project and saving you hours of manual coding and configuration.

education.details: B.Tech in Information Technology - 9.3GPA(1st year) (Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology)

interests.title: Artificial Intelligence
interests.description: Exploring the impact of AI on web development.

posts.title: Attended DevFest Kolkata 2024
posts.description: Thrilled to share that I attended my very first hashtag #DevFestKolkata24, organized by GDG Kolkata at The Westin Hotel in Kolkata.

posts.title: 2nd runner-up team of Hack4Bengal 3.0
posts.description: Excited to share that our team secured the 2nd runner-up position in the Hack4Bengal 3.0 hackathon organized by the Government of West Bengal.

posts.title: My First Blog on Hashnode
posts.description: Finally Published My First Blog on Hashnode! Title : Unlocking Backend Simplicity: Building Scalable Apps with Convex

profiles.description: I am studying at Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology, West Bengal, India and pursuing B.Tech Computer Science Engineering right now. I am a Front-End Web Developer and also have an experience of Coding on both Java and Python. I am an avid learner and ready to take the future challenges of my life.
